trans-unit.source: Contains methods and fields for UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Contém métodos e campos para aplicativos de cliente de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Registers a method that handles [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] events.
trans-unit.target: Registra um método que manipula [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] eventos.

trans-unit.source: Some classes, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>, expose fields identifying events that are specific to the class.
trans-unit.target: Algumas classes, como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>, expor campos identificar eventos que são específicos para a classe.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>

trans-unit.source: The AddAutomationEventHandler method provides a mechanism that enables you to register handlers for these events.
trans-unit.target: O método AddAutomationEventHandler fornece um mecanismo que permite que você registre manipuladores para esses eventos.

trans-unit.source: `eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `eventHandler`pode ser uma instância de método ou uma referência para o método (`AddressOf` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the event the method will handle.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o evento que tratará o método.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to associate with the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento para associar o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and descendants.
trans-unit.target: O escopo de eventos a ser manipulada; ou seja, se eles forem no próprio elemento ou em seus ancestrais e descendentes.

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the specified event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Método a ser chamado quando ocorre o evento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Registers a method that will handle focus-changed events.
trans-unit.target: Registra um método que tratará eventos foco alterado.

trans-unit.source: Focus-changed events are system-wide; you cannot set a narrower scope.
trans-unit.target: Eventos de foco alterado abrangem todo o sistema; não é possível definir um escopo mais restrito.

trans-unit.source: `eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `eventHandler`pode ser uma instância de método ou uma referência para o método (`AddressOf` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O método para chamar quando o evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Registers a method that will handle property-changed events.
trans-unit.target: Registra um método que tratará eventos de propriedade alterada.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] item specified by the supplied [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element might not support the properties specified by the `properties` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] item especificado pelo fornecido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento pode não dar suporte as propriedades especificadas pelo `properties` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: `eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `eventHandler`pode ser uma instância de método ou uma referência para o método (`AddressOf` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element with which to associate the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento ao qual associar o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and children.
trans-unit.target: O escopo de eventos a ser manipulada; ou seja, se eles são no próprio elemento ou em seus ancestrais e filhos.

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O método para chamar quando o evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] properties of interest.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] propriedades de interesse.

trans-unit.source: Registers the method that will handle structure-changed events.
trans-unit.target: Registra o método que tratará eventos estrutura alterada.

trans-unit.source: `eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `eventHandler`pode ser uma instância de método ou uma referência para o método (`AddressOf` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element with which to associate the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento ao qual associar o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and descendants.
trans-unit.target: O escopo de eventos a ser manipulada; ou seja, se eles forem no próprio elemento ou em seus ancestrais e descendentes.

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the structure-changed event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Método a ser chamado quando ocorre o evento alterado de estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Compares two integer arrays containing run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] to determine whether their content is the same.
trans-unit.target: Compara duas matrizes de inteiro que contém o tempo de execução [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] para determinar se o seu conteúdo é o mesmo.

trans-unit.source: If either of the arguments is a null reference (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), Compare throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Se dos argumentos for uma referência nula (`Nothing` na [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), comparar lança um <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>exceção.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: The first run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to compare.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução primeiro [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] para comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to compare.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução segundo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] para comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the compared run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] refer to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o tempo de execução comparado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] se referem à mesma [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elemento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements, returning <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if both refer to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elementos, retornando <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se se referem à mesma [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: If either of the arguments is a null reference (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.Compare%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Se dos argumentos for uma referência nula (`Nothing` na [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.Compare%2A>lança um <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>exceção.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the equality operator for <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é equivalente ao operador de igualdade para <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: The first [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The second [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the run time identifiers of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements are the same; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os identificadores de tempo de execução do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementos são os mesmos; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that can contain content.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma exibição predefinida do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árvore que inclua apenas [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elementos que contêm o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are controls.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma exibição predefinida do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árvore que inclua apenas [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elementos que são controles.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of the specified control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o nome do padrão de controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the control pattern, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the specified pattern is not found.
trans-unit.target: O nome amigável do padrão de controle, ou uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) se o padrão especificado não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o nome do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property identifier of the named property.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] identificador de propriedade da propriedade nomeada.

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property is not found.
trans-unit.target: O nome amigável do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] propriedade ou uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> na [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) se especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] propriedade não foi encontrada.

trans-unit.source: Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma exibição predefinida do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árvore que inclui todos os [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elementos.

trans-unit.source: Used by itself, this condition is functionally identical to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>.
trans-unit.target: Usado por si só, essa condição é funcionalmente idêntica ao <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Removes all registered [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handlers.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as marcas [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] manipuladores de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handler.
trans-unit.target: Remove o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: An event identifier.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador de evento.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element on which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento no qual remover o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler*> for the specified event identifier and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: O método do manipulador que foi passado para <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler*>para o identificador de evento especificado e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified focus-changed event handler.
trans-unit.target: Remove o manipulador de eventos de foco alterado especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows a focus-changed event handler being added and removed.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra um manipulador de eventos de foco alterado sendo adicionados e removidos.

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#102](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/ClientForm.vb#102)] [!code-cs[UIAClient_snip#102](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/ClientForm.cs#102)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[UIAClient_snipf](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/ClientForm.vb#102)][!code-cs[UIAClient_snipf ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/ClientForm.cs#102)]

trans-unit.source: A handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler*>
trans-unit.target: Um método do manipulador que foi passado para<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler*></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified property-changed event handler.
trans-unit.target: Remove o manipulador de eventos de alteração de propriedade especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows a property-changed event handler being added and removed.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra um manipulador de evento de propriedade alterada, que está sendo adicionados e removidos.

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[UIAClient_snip#172](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/PropertySnips.cs#172)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#172](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/PropertySnips.vb#172)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[UIAClient_snip¬](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/PropertySnips.cs#172)][!code-vb[UIAClient_snip¬ ](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/PropertySnips.vb#172)]

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento do qual remover o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: A handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler*> for the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Um método do manipulador que foi passado para <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler*>especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified structure-changed event handler.
trans-unit.target: Remove o manipulador de eventos especificado estrutura alterada.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento do qual remover o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: A handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddStructureChangedEventHandler*> for the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Um método do manipulador que foi passado para <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddStructureChangedEventHandler*>especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddStructureChangedEventHandler*>
